about_the_game:
Born into a family of gravediggers, our protagonist is an absolute coward.
The poor boy faints at every ghost encounter in the nighttime forest. And every night in his dreams, his strict mother appears,
Always lecturing: "Become a proper gravedigger!" Then one day, a mysterious girl appears and says, "Why not win gold at the Mandragora Championship? That might make your mother happy!"
Really? If that's what it takes to break free from mother's shadow, then so be it! And so begins his journey to collect and breed these strange plants called 'Mandragoras', All in pursuit of that gold prize. But the path ahead is far from simple.

The Mandragoras grow differently based on the climate, time, and moon phases in the forest and graveyard, And with ghosts and mysterious will-o'-wisps appearing, there's no time to faint! (Though he definitely will)

Can he uncover the secrets of the Mandragoras, Win gold, and become the "Star of the Gravediggers"!? Or will he forever remain under his mother's shadow...!?

[Game Features]
Mysterious Mandragora Collection
Special Mandragoras appear at different times and placesRumors say moonlight affects Mandragora growth...Some rare varieties only show themselves on rainy days...?

Secrets of Mandragora Breeding
A three-day breeding processThere might be ways to speed this up...Even breeding the same species might yield unexpected results!

[Characters You'll Meet]
- A mysterious girl with pink hair
- A suspicious gardener who brokers championships
- A castle maid with suspicious nighttime activities

- Also, new residents will be added in the future!

[Exploration Elements]
- Dangers that change between day and night
- Stealth elements to avoid monsters and ghosts
- Rare Mandragoras discovered in unexpected places
Under the watchful gaze of his mother's portrait, can our cowardly gravedigger win all four championships and become a proper gravedigger? A mysterious adventure with Mandragoras awaits you.

[Perfect For Players Who]
- Love collection games with a unique atmosphere
- Want to enjoy a distinctively atmospheric adventure
- Enjoy exploration with stealth elements
